entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 1:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
